item.val: Okinawa Scuba Diving Course – SEASIR Group
Okinawa PADI 5 Star Instructor Development Resort, provide English, Mandarin, Cantonese and Japanese diving courses
PADI diving courses with English, Mandarin & Cantonese speaking Instructor.

We offer international recognized certification PADI in our training facility. Our friendly and experience instructors conducting courses in Japanese, English, Mandarin, Cantonese and Bahasa Malaysia.

• Day 1 - Theory review & Confined water training (Pool training half day)
  • Day 2 - Open Water training dive 1 & 2
  • Day 3 - Open Water training dive 3 & 4
Above training schedule is designed for PADI e-learning program.

• Please purchase e-learning course from PADI official website: www.padi.com and pay course fee USD184. (NOT included in the PADI Open Water Diver Course fee.)
    MUST Complete PADI e-learning program from PADI official website 3 days before the training course. Please download OW E-Learning Course Information for more details.
  • Please refer SEASIR Health Check List at this link Health Check List . If any of the questions in the Health Check List answer apply “YES” to you, we must request that you consult with a physician and provide a proper document from your physician prior to participating in scuba diving training program.
  • Please bring your eRecord (with all the review score) and 2 of passport size photos to our shop on your training day.

• Any courses date that fall in Peak Season in Season Calendar course fee add JPY5,000 per each candidate. Please kindly check the calendar as below:
    • SEASIR NAHA branch, Peak season refer to 2017 SEASON CALENDAR
    • Marine Club BERRY, Peak season refer to 2017 SEASON CALENDAR
    • SEASIR AKA branch, Peak season:
      • 28th April to 7th May 2017
      • 10th June to 9th October 2017.
Use of Scuba equipment during training
Lunch box for open water training days

• Boat Dive
  • Drift Dive
  • Peak performance Buoyancy Dive
  • Search and Recovery Dive
  • Underwater naturalist Dive
  • Underwater Digital Photography Dive
  • Night Dive

• Please refer SEASIR Health Check List at this link Health Check List . If any of the questions in the Health Check List answer apply “YES” to you, we must request that you consult with a physician and provide a proper document from your physician prior to participating in scuba diving training program.
  • Valid PADI Open Water Diver License or equivalent (please advise in advance).
  • 2 of Passport size photos.
• Half day hand on training on primary and secondary care theory and pratical

• Day 1 - Academic session & 2 session practical training
  • Day 2 - 3 session practical training

• Please refer SEASIR Health Check List.If any of the questions in the Health Check List answer apply “YES” to you, we must request that you consult with a physician and provide a proper document from your physician prior to participating in scuba diving training program.
  • 2 Passport size photograph.
  • Training course start with minimum 2 candidates. For 1 candidate course fee will be JPY69,000.

Click on BOOKING NOW, you will require to fill in your email address as your contact. Fill in all information as required and summit. You will receive a PayPal deposit request from SEASIR LTD. account, to secure your booking please make your deposit of JPY5,000 per person within 3 days start from the day you receive deposit request from our PayPal account, or within 24 hours if your booking request is less than less than 3 days from the departure date. All booking request will cancel if no deposit receive.
